keyword: calories in a teaspoon of peanut butter
title: Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in a teaspoon of peanut butter, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fats, carbs, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter; unsalted, no added sugars or oils; approximately 5 g per teaspoon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (natural vs. processed), ingredients, and measurement accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of peanut butter contains about 32 kcal and 1.3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a teaspoon of natural peanut butter?
faqs.a: About 32 kcal for natural, unsalted peanut butter.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one teaspoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Roughly 1.3 g of protein per teaspoon.

faqs.q: Does peanut butter have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.9 g total fat per teaspoon, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: How much sodium in peanut butter per teaspoon?
faqs.a: Around 20 mg for unsalted; salted versions can have 50-100 mg more.

faqs.q: Is peanut butter keto-friendly in small amounts?
faqs.a: Yes, low carbs (1.2 g per teaspoon) make it suitable, but watch portions for calorie control.
